text: Hi.  Are you a bot?
No i am not
Have you don this HIT before?
No i have not
My goal is supposed to get you to donate any amount to a charity.  It's up to you whether you want to donate or not
No i do not want to donate any money
That's totally fine.  What is your task anyway?
I do not have any task, what do you think. Tell me more about the charity
What does your communicator role task description say?
talking about children's charity
The charity is Save the Children
Oh okay. Where is it located?
I'm not sure.  I've done this HIT before.  You get a bonus if you donate even just one cent.
not i am not even willing to donate anything
That's totally fine.  How long have you been doing mTurk?
i do not think that is what we are meant to talk about. Can we talk about your charity, maybe i can talk to some people about it
It's related to charity.  I was going to follow up if you ever donate to charities when a HIT prompts you to do so
How do i donate if i want to donate
It appears at the end of the survey once this chat is done
Okay i will look forward to it then
